abstract: Previewing the games involving American players that Jurgen Klinsmann might be watching this weekend.
snippet: Previewing the games involving American players that Jurgen Klinsmann might be watching this weekend.
lead_paragraph: If Jurgen Klinsmann holds true to form, he will announce his rosters for the upcoming friendlies against France and Slovenia on Thursday or Friday of next week. That means that this weekend most likely represents Klinsmann's last opportunity to see a full slate of games featuring prospective United States national team players before he sets his squad.

headline.main: Weekend TV Guide, Oct. 29-30: Decision Time
